Plot: Arthur Pendragon is King! Unchallenged on the battlefield, he melds the country together in a time of promise. But sinister powers plot to destroy Camelot, and when the witch-queen Morgause -- Arthur's own half sister -- ensnares him in an incestuous liaison, a fatal web of love, betrayal, and bloody vengeance is woven.
Characters: Morgause, Arthur Pendragon, Merlin, Sir Mordred, Ygraine, Ulfin, Cador of Cornwall, Bedwyr of Benoic, Morgan Greer, Lot of Lothian, Beltane, Ninian, Casso, NimuÃ«, Queen Guinevere
